author: Alex Day
description: Considered by many as a contemporary classic, "The Vineyard" is equal parts rye spicy punch, amaro herbal bittersweetness, and cream sherry richness with a touch of zesty orange oil freshening bitterness. Best appreciated as a digestivo or nightcap.
name: La Vi√±a
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
